short_summary: Upgrading exterior lighting at Willow Cree Healing Lodge including general site lighting, Building B05 Area & Pathways lighting to the South Sweat Lodge
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:  Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 17, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Work of this contract comprises upgrading the exterior lighting at the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Willow Cree Healing Lodge including general site lighting, Building B05 Area & Pathways lighting to the South Sweat Lodge. Work also includes a community address system. This posting is the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase solicitation process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers. The second phase (Phase Two) will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings. Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided above for complete details.
